name: Saudade (demo)
description:
Alexa Roberts have found herself in a predicament. She's stuck with an annoying ghost and she can't get over her ex!

Here's a last minute short visual novel entry for Yuri Jam 2017.

All assets are temporary. The script was written on one sitting. You have been warned. It was an idea I can't get out of my head while working on another yuri vn project that unfortunately won't make it for the deadline.

Frustrations gave birth to this beast. I'll continue working on this on the earlier part of next year.

For now, I hope you enjoy the story.
